snippet: World number two Andy Murray, four times a losing finalist, will continue his pursuit of a first Australian Open title against eighth seed David Ferrer in a quarter-final match on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: World number two Andy Murray, four times a losing finalist, will continue his pursuit of a first Australian Open title against eighth seed David Ferrer in a quarter-final match on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Ferrer Blocking Murray's Path to First Australian Open Title
headline.main: Ferrer Blocking Murray's Path to First Australian Open Title
